content:
# I've successfully located the stone patch and am now moving towards it.
# Once I reach the stone patch, I will gather a quantity of stone to add to my inventory.

# I will harvest a quantity of 10 stone pieces from this stone patch.
harvested_stone = harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=harvest_quantity)
print(f'Harvested {harvested_stone} stone from the patch.')
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")
